title: Good Morning Football Podcast Episode 9
itunes:title: Good Morning Football Podcast Episode 9
description:
On the #GMFB Podcast this week: Peter discusses his travels during Divisional Weekend and the process of a TV production meeting (:58); The group talks about the science of asking sideline questions (5:00); Peter compares the atmospheres of the Georgia Dome and Arrowhead (7:50); The group comments on traveling and seeing fans of the show (9:52); Peter talks about the Falcons new stadium after taking a tour (12:10); Nate discusses a player's perspective of playing in a new stadium (16:06); A breakdown of the NFC title game (18:32) and the prolific Falcons offense (21:35); The hosts put forth their preferred Super Bowl Matchups (28:17); A look at the AFC Title Game and Steelers RB Le’Veon Bell (31:36); Players and their use of social media (34:55); and finally, Nate discusses his trip to Florida and the science of Gatorade (48:53).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
